tool_description: Serverless blogging enables you to integrate a blogging system within seconds, whilst giving clients a full WYISWYG interface to create and sort content as they please.
name: Serverless blogging
title: Serverless blogging

api_list.name: MEDIA
api_list.description: Get image from your sapphire account

api_list.name: BLOG
GROUPS
api_list.description: Get different blog groups of your account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cheikhshift-serverless-blogging-v1.p.rapidapi.com/groups/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cheikhshift-serverless-blogging-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
